title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  "Kitchen of Homstead Cottage, Jamaica", West Indies.", July 1865
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue-green paper
markings:
Recto: Stamped in ink, at lower right:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457e
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower left:  Kitchen of / Hamstead Cottage; and again, at lower right:  Jamaica / July / 65
description: Vertical rectangle showing the rear of a house with a steep shingle roof and a turret seen obliquely from above, with the open door and shutters, and trees standing in the rear.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  "Kitchen of Homstead Cottage, Jamaica", West Indies.", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite, brush and white gouache on blue-green paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-411.
